name: Goblin Gold Rush
description:
In Goblin Gold Rush the point of the game is to collect 
all the gold nuggets in the cave while avoiding the dragon
who protects his fortune! If the dragon catches you three
times, you are dead and the gold you collected stays in the
cave. Can you collect all the gold?

Meet the Team:

Curtis Marcoux

Miranda Leites Gonzalez

Holden Elling

Jazlyn Dukes

First project for Game Production
